webintegrator.name: Trained WebIntegrator 🎉
webintegrator.description:
I passed my training as a WebIntegrator with a 12. 
I have learned how to make websites, webshops and much more.

ghc.name: Web developer at GHC Travel ✈️
ghc.description:
After some internships elsewhere, in 2017 I got my first job as a web developer at GHC Travel. 
I was responsible for migrating and modernizing their existing website from pure PHP to Laravel 6

syncronet.name: Developer at Syncronet 📺
syncronet.description:
After COVID-19 hit Denmark, I unfortunately had to change jobs. 
I got a job at Syncronet where I have been around to help develop their video streaming platform. 
In broad strokes, I took most of it.

juice.name: Web developer at JUICE 👊
juice.description:
In 2023, I got the opportunity to be part of something new and exciting. 
I got a job at JUICE, where I have helped develop a platform that turns the job market upside down.

servers.description: I have experience with many different Linux distros, and can set up a server or a cluster from scratch.
servers.name: Servers

security.name: Security 🛡️
security.description:
I have, among other things, 
worked with setting up secured VPN networks and has experience in making secure web applications.

backend_development.name: Backend API development ⚙️
backend_development.description:
I have experience in creating APIs in Laravel, and have, among other things, 
made an API for a video streaming platform and a ticket booking platform.

automated_testing.name: Automated testing
automated_testing.description: I have experience doing automated tests in Laravel and Symfony with PHPUnit, I make use of TDD as far and as possible.

databases.name: Databases 🍩
databases.description: I have extensive experience with MySQL, MariaDB

frontend_development.name: Frontend development ✨
frontend_development.description: I have experience in creating frontends in Vue, React and Laravel blade Livewire.

app_development.name: App development 📱
app_development.description:
I have experience in making apps in React Native incl. 
native modules in Java/Kotlin

vcs.name: Version Control
vcs.description:
I have experience with Git and have, among other things, 
used it to keep track of my own projects as well as projects at work.

backups.name: Backups 💾
backups.description: I have learned how important it is to have backups of one's data, and have experience in making backups of databases and files.
